description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for a web API, including endpoints for '/hello', '/employees', and '/skill-factories'. It incorporates Swagger documentation annotations for API specification. It connects to controller modules for employees and skill factories, handling CRUD operations and in-memory data management.

methods.name: router.get('/hello')
methods.description: Handler for GET request to '/hello', returns a 'Hello World' plain text response.

methods.name: router.post('/employees')
methods.description: Handler for creating a new employee record, delegates to employeesController.create.

methods.name: router.get('/employees')
methods.description: Handler for listing all employee records, delegates to employeesController.list.

methods.name: router.put('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Handler for replacing an employee record, delegates to employeesController.replace.

methods.name: router.patch('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Handler for partially updating an employee record, delegates to employeesController.patch.

methods.name: router.delete('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Handler for deleting an employee record, delegates to employeesController.delete.

methods.name: router.post('/skill-factories')
methods.description: Handler for creating a new skill factory record, delegates to skillFactoriesController.create.

methods.name: router.get('/skill-factories')
methods.description: Handler for listing all skill factory records, delegates to skillFactoriesController.list.

methods.name: router.get('/skill-factories/:skillFactoryId')
methods.description: Handler for retrieving a specific skill factory by ID, delegates to skillFactoriesController.getById.

methods.name: router.put('/skill-factories/:skillFactoryId')
methods.description: Handler for replacing a skill factory record, delegates to skillFactoriesController.replace.

methods.name: router.patch('/skill-factories/:skillFactoryId')
methods.description: Handler for partially updating a skill factory, delegates to skillFactoriesController.patch.

methods.name: router.delete('/skill-factories/:skillFactoryId')
methods.description: Handler for deleting a skill factory, delegates to skillFactoriesController.delete.
